attributes.action: change policy to a full remuneration package to all agency staff via employer/union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Agency staff are destined to make their own provision for pensions, unions and holidays etc.
If permanent employees are now encouraged to take out pensions, then why not oblige agency staff too?

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
